fields.title: The Godfather
fields.description: The aging patriarch of the Corleone crime family transfers control of his organized crime empire to his reluctant son, who is drawn deeper into the violent world of the Mafia.

fields.title: The Godfather Part II
fields.description: The film presents parallel narratives: the rise of Vito Corleone from immigrant to Mafia boss in early 20th-century New York, and the consolidation of power by his son as head of the Corleone family.

fields.title: Pulp Fiction
fields.description: Interwoven stories of Los Angeles criminals explore violence, loyalty, and redemption through the lives of hitmen, a boxer, a mob boss, and small-time thieves.

fields.title: The Dark Knight
fields.description: Batman faces a chaotic criminal mastermind who seeks to destabilize Gotham City by challenging its institutions, forcing moral dilemmas that test the limits of justice and order.

fields.title: Se7en
fields.description: Two detectives investigate a series of murders inspired by the seven deadly sins, uncovering a meticulously planned campaign of psychological and moral punishment.

fields.title: Inception
fields.description: A professional thief who specializes in extracting information from dreams is tasked with planting an idea into a targetâ€™s subconscious through layered dream states.

fields.title: Interstellar
fields.description: In a future where Earth is becoming uninhabitable, a group of astronauts travels through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity.

fields.title: The Matrix
fields.description: A computer hacker learns that reality is a simulated construct created by machines, and joins a resistance movement to free humanity from artificial control.

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
fields.description: A young hobbit inherits a powerful ring and embarks on a perilous journey with companions to prevent it from falling into the hands of a dark lord.

fields.title: Titanic
fields.description: A romance unfolds between two passengers from different social classes aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic during its maiden voyage.
